name: prius_chaser
text: this is wonderful.

name: mustakrakesh
text: A comment left by mustakrakesh was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CygnusX-1, littlecat, IrishGuy, DShock, kestral)

name: i_love_kate
text: Whatever, shallow.

name: greenkoolayd
text: whatever, jealous.

name: gusplease
text: There aren't enough 5s in the world to do that final panel justice.

name: saint
text:
that couch had us all fooled. here we thought it wanted to go to Florida.
*snap*

name: stuntman
text: yeah, classic couch antics!

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, Connellingus, rhymesforkids, Lokiamis)

name: djwhiterabbit
text: A comment left by djwhiterabbit was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Crowpaw, sevenarts, Connellingus, Lokiamis)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: like Florida.

name: tripperday
text: Do Floridians have problems finding places to get pregnant?

name: zapatos
text: You ever get pregg'd in FL?  It is so hot and there are gators everywhere.

name: st-elmos_fire
text: the thing about gators, is they like babies in a way that is uniquely different than the way that most people like babies. Or at least the way I think most people like babies.

name: gunsofray
text:
oh, so .. you're saying .. what i do with babies.. isn't normal?

MOTHER.. SHE LIED

name: hellofyellin
text: Phillipe completely understands about the couch's retirement plans.

name: mrsmuckles
text: A comment left by mrsmuckles was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, sevenarts, Connellingus)

name: c_dizzle
text: Why does Philippe have to turn into Eddie Haskel?

name: tessebatt
text: That's what I was thinking too.

name: stuntman
text: Right?  All with some campy laughter from the audience.

name: kneejerk
text: how does phillipe snap.  he has flippers.

name: mrcreighton
text: Phillipe is a river otter, so he has claws (likely webbed). I lived on the Isle of Skye for a year and I failed to see even one damn otter.

name: straw
text: Meanwhile Maine is fed up with them, I'm just glad they never try to cross a road

name: shenred
text: Oh, man, I could not imagine accidentally running over an otter after reading Achewood for so long.  On my knees at the side of the road, blubbering out the lyrics to "There Goes a Special Boy."

name: thesyndicate88
text: A BLOO BLA BLOO BLOO!

name: onepapertiger
text: Appropriate on all levels

name: tommycrashwreck
text: High fives all around.

name: fallow_fields
text: that's a wrap, people

name: goosey
text:
Could have gone to Glenelg. Plenty of otters around there.

I saw a few otters on Skye but then I lived there for six years.

name: professorhazard
text: An otter tried to befriend my on Skype, but it was just trying to use me as a free sounding board for practicing English.

name: retinarow
text: It's because he's such a young racaly flippersnapper.

name: sargasm
text: Teodor knows how to deal with children.  Did he pick this up from Lie Bot's king piss deceit?

name: whitey
text: Phillipe's coping mechanisms are fully intact, despite his ordeal.

name: senseihollywood
text: A comment left by senseihollywood was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pityparty, giessel, lucidaconsole, ep2, TTAGXAMM)

name: senseihollywood
text: A comment left by senseihollywood was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, lucidaconsole, Lumus, lateadopter)

name: senseihollywood
text: A comment left by senseihollywood was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, tigi, lucidaconsole)

name: soticoto
text: For Ultra-Peanut of course.

name: rmj12345
text: I think this strip was probably inspired by Onstad's kid and dog. Because I don't remember any other dogs.

name: mortshire
text: the stuffed animals all "live" in onstad's house.  with his kid.  and his dog.  so yes.

name: dicklaurent
text: There's Scrambles, but he is lost.

name: tekende
text: There's also Ray's false Magreaux dog.

name: cbtbone
text: Yeah but that was Bensington Butters, who is a cat (probably?).

name: tekende
text: No, it was a dog, hired or owned by Bensington Butters.

name: phthoggos
text: Téodor is incredible.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Yeah, this is one of Teodor's most inspired moments.

name: ham_shoes
text: I imagine his voice sounds like Charlie Brown's, somehow...

name: coconutjohn
text: philippe is so thoughtful

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by goocifer, isunklower, Connellingus, _cheesekayke)

name: catachresis
text: Oh damn Philippe why can't I just adopt you already

name: qingofchina
text: This really reminds me of the Calvin and Hobbes strip where Calvin's dad tells him that B&W photos are in B&W because The World was in B&W back then.

name: mortshire
text: my dad told me this too. screwed up my worldview for YEARS.

name: spicyponyhead
text:
My friend's parents used to say that the bell on the ice cream truck meant that it was out of ice cream.

Saving for your kid's eventual therapy is the new college fund.

name: geesycreesy
text: Good call with the Calvin and Hobbes nod! Now that I look at Philippe's newspaper cap, it reminds me of the type that Calvin wears on his make-believe sea-faring adventures.

name: werewolves
text: I thought that without anybody telling me. I just assumed .

name: morganization
text: phillipe gets old man in the last panel

name: morganization
text: and i've since stolen "that guy!" as a way to express how impressed i am with another's acumen

name: patkun
text: Téodor shows his rarely-exhibited nurturing side.

name: 1000hz
text:
Let's don't and say we did!

Philippe is awesome.

name: gmm
text: In opposition to what people often say on Achewood comments: I've actually been saying "Let's not and say we did" for years. Phillipe, man. I like his styles.

name: byronic
text: A comment left by byronic was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pityparty, Unfun, stopeatingmyeyes, envika, fosters, GMM, peterjoel)

name: electricjelly
text: I always thought that the dog "getting pregnant" means that it gave birth on the couch. Now I suddenly realize that it says *getting* into pregnancy, not finishing it...

name: joeyramoney
text: that was beautiful.

name: riazm
text:
ALTERNATIVE TEXT:

Yeah, let's don't learn Chinese and say we did.

name: professoryes
text: I love that it sounds sarcastic. Once again, the alt-text is not above criticizing the strip.

name: molesticide
text:
will they say that they did not learn chinese IN chinese?

that boggles my mind.

name: pyro_ike
text:
"Comprende?"
"..Everything but 'comprende'."

name: mystkmanat
text:
"Capisce?"
"...Catfish?"

name: steerpike66
text: Theodore really knows how to white-lie Philippe. Look at those relieved little eyes in frame 10.

name: neitherman
text: I'm drowning in the pure saccharine sweetness of this strip.

name: spinynorman
text: It's odd that I can remember alt text sometimes more than the strip itself, but this is definitely the case here.

name: deusoma
text: Sweetest speech to an upset child anyone's ever heard.

name: stuart
text: I wish my parents would/could have humored me so.

name: peterjoel
text: You got a lot of issues related to couch removal?

name: stuart
text: My issues are deeply... couched?

name: woodenteeth
text: I lamed you, but only in the way you'd lame your Dad for a joke like that and smirk at the stupid grin on his head.

name: stuart
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: patkun
text: ...Cods are scary, but mackerel are holy. For some reson this totally commonplace phrase just cracks me up in this context...

name: nikopol
text: secretly Phillipe is scared of China because of the time he dug his way there and came out under the house of a dictator.

name: cameasiam
text: He never actually went through with the dig.

name: cameasiam
text: But I did go through with the being a dick.

name: professorhazard
text: Philippe is not going to China because that is where his terrifyingly foreign girlfriend hails from.

name: tragicone
text: i would believe she is from japan. Although maybe it was stated that she was from china. I am too lazy to look.

name: tekende
text:
I don't believe it stated either way, but the alt text claimed that Onstad's wife is Chinese.

So really WHO KNOWS.

name: abreez_e
text:
She writes and speaks in traditional Chinese, so i reckon she's Chinese.

Although, if it's traditional she could be Taiwanese. And that's kind of a different country, unless you're from a state that wants to keep on the right side of Beijing.

name: foxtrotamend
text:
If the day ever comes when I stop loving Philippe, please kill me.
By the way, this comic assured it, I am buying a Philippe T-Shirt.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ...i swear to God i'll tip you as a dying gesture.

name: paco
text: Wait. What fucking dog? There are never any dogs in Achewood. And why would Teodor have one and let it have babies on his couch?

name: tagrineth
text: Remember, they live in Onstad's house and Onstad has like two dogs.

name: dumase
text: He was pretty smart, our old couch.

name: tragicone
text: The resolution brings me great joy.

name: chachibenji
text: HeartWARMIN aw shucks. *snap*

name: killingthejay
text: applesauce!

name: catbark
text: I did not learnt Chinese, but by god I'm going to say I did. I love Philippe's face in panel ten - that couch is *such* a cut-up!

name: redmange
text:
I don't care if the last time I used this phrase is the only time I've gotten lamed so far, I will use it again dammit.

We can't learn Chinease, that shit is all ching chong wing wong.

name: unsentletter
text:
Phillipe's "That guy!" realization face is heart-breakingly rendered.

Perfect, Onstad.

name: pogo
text: One of the best Phillipe faces yet, no doubt.

name: hamscout
text:
Are there times when people have gas, and they can help it?

#8675: You're on the couch, and your girlfriend does a :(
Pound your fist on the arm of the couch, and cry "damn dog won't lay off the taquitos--she knows it ain't good for the baby!

name: radarjammer
text: I want to put Phillippe in a little jar and carry him around with me.

name: stuntman
text: with tiny air holes for breathing.

name: skavid
text: I'm glad Philippe didn;t want to learn Chinese. I mean, that shit's crazy! It's all CHING CHONG WING WONG.

name: srikamaraja
text: This completely made my day.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Why would we want to learn Chinese? It's all "CHING CHONG WING WONG!"

name: duperando
text: THE ALT TEXT MAKES MY WORLD.

name: mal3
text:
This actually made me tear up, Teodor explaining the retirement days of the couch.

Stupid permanent brain damage caused by paxil. STUPID

name: dreiganh2o
text: I learned Chinese.
